patthana15.7:1.1_0: Hetuṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.7:2.1_0: Hetuṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.7:3.1_0: Hetuṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
